summary: Adds a Craftable Ebony Mail body to Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
Adds a Craftable Ebony Mail body to Skyrim.  I did this as a learning exercise so I could figure out how to import armor for another mod I\'m working on.  This is simply a standalone version of the armor.  It is available to both male and female characters.  Unlike the vanilla ebony mail, this does show the correct ground version of the armor on the inventory screen for female characters.

Notes: The hair in the last image is ApachiiSkyhair, this is not included.

[BUGS] The file is missing the textures and meshes so they are not showing up in game.  Presently looking for a fix.
author: helblaze

files.name: gildedebonymail
files.changelogHtml: First version, fixed initial issue where armor would not display texture on male characters.

files.name: gildedebonymail1_1a
files.changelogHtml:
Changed name to Gilded Ebony Mail
changed around armor directories, so it should now show up (it did for me after I had deleted the textures from my data folder)

files.name: Textures_Meshes1_1a
files.changelogHtml:
Changed name to Gilded Ebony Mail
changed around armor directories, so it should now show up (it did for me after I had deleted the textures from my data folder)
